arts.ttl: Source: Galatasaray eye summer Gündogan move
arts.sum: Galatasaray are plotting a summer move for Manchester City midfielder Ilkay Gündogan, a source has told ESPN.

arts.ttl: Galatasaray prepare first offer to Rennes for Amine Gouiri
arts.sum: Stade Rennais broke their transfer record to sign Amine Gouiri (24) from OGC Nice for €28 million in 2022. However, the inconsistent attacker has very rarely lived up to the…

arts.ttl: Galatasaray take interest in Rennes’ Amine Gouiri
arts.sum: Turkish Süper Lig giants Galatasaray have taken an interest in signing Rennes striker Amine Gouiri (24), according to a report this Tuesday from Foot Mercato. The outlet understands that the…
